References

   
Module PropertyAnimatorCore
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/PropertyAnimatorCore/Source/PropertyAnimatorCore/Public/Subsystems/PropertyAnimatorCoreSubsystem.h
Include #include "Subsystems/PropertyAnimatorCoreSubsystem.h"

Syntax

UCLASS ()  
class UPropertyAnimatorCoreSubsystem : public UEngineSubsystem

Remarks

This subsystem handle all property animators

TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCoreBase > > AnimatorsWeak Animators available to link properties to
bool bFilesLoaded  
TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCoreConverterBase > > ConvertersWeak Converters available to transform a type to another type
TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCoreHandlerBase > > HandlersWeak Handlers are used to set/get same type properties and reuse logic
TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCorePresetBase > > PresetsWeak Presets available to apply on animator
TMap< FString, FString > PropertyAliases Some property should have a friendlier name and replace the original name by an alias
TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCoreResolver > > ResolversWeak Resolvers find properties to let user control them when they are unreachable/hidden
TMap< FName, TFunction< UFunction *(const UObject *)> > SetterResolvers Some property and their setter cannot be identified automatically, use manual setter resolvers
TSet< TWeakObjectPtr< UPropertyAnimatorCoreTimeSourceBase > > TimeSourcesWeak Time sources available to use with animators
